title: Education Quality Gap Between Urban and Rural
summary: Significant disparity exists in education quality between urban and rural schools, perpetuating cycles of poverty and limiting opportunities.
currentSituation: Rural schools face teacher shortages, lack of qualified instructors, inadequate learning materials, and poor infrastructure. Urban students have access to better schools, private tutoring, and digital resources. This gap widens with each grade level.
consequences: Lower pass rates in national examinations
Brain drain from rural to urban areas
potentialTechInterventions: Free online learning platforms in Bangla
